channel.title: DClaws+FireCape WON'T lose/drop
channel.description: Well even if they're skilled, firecape and claws WON'T drop. There used to be a method for it, for getting both of those items from jad, but I took away 13664(claws) from that method, and everything.. Compiled, and still.. You just CAN'T lose claws..

item.title: DClaws+FireCape WON'T lose/drop
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

Well even if they’re skilled, firecape and claws WON’T drop. There used to be a method for it, for getting both of those items from jad, but I took away 13664(claws) from that method, and everything… Compiled, and still… You just CAN’T lose claws…
